author: fwyzard
body:
This PR includes a backport of the following PRs:
  - #18172
  - #18950
  - #18959
  - #18968
  - #18971
  - #19023
  - #19046
  - #19078
  - #19119
  - #19178
  - #19290
  - #19293
  - #19294
  - #19490
  - #19499
  - #19519
  - #19520
  - #19561
  - #19577
  - #19585
  - #19596
  - #19599
  - #19616
  - #19627
  - #19689
  - #19694
  - #19703
  - #19781
  - #19794 

plus the older ones, contained in DQMOffline/Trigger and HLTriggerOffline.

It synchronises with CMSSW_9_3_X_2017-07-28-1100
  - DQMServices/ClientConfig
  - DQMOffline/Configuration
  - DQMOffline/Trigger
  - HLTriggerOffline/Btag
  - HLTriggerOffline/Higgs
  - HLTriggerOffline/SUSYBSM
  - HLTriggerOffline/Tau
  - HLTriggerOffline/Top
title: backport HLT DQM for menu v2.1 to CMSSW 9.2.x
